title: Texarkana toddler airlifted to hospital after shooting
content:
A two-year-old boy is in a Little Rock hospital after being shot in the head.
It happened around six p.m., Friday night in the 6000 block of Summerwood Lane in Texarkana, Arkansas.
Police say witnesses told them the boy found a gun in the house and it discharged a single bullet.
He was airlifted to a hospital in Little Rock with what's being described as life-threatening injuries.
